title: Sleeping Child
lyrics:
[intro] (F-Bb) (Gm-C) 3x
(F) The mil(Bb)key way, (C) upon (F)the heavens 
(F) Is twinking (Bb)just for you (Csus4-C)
(F) And Mr. (Bb)Moon, (A)he came (Dm)by 
To (Gm)say goodnight to you (Csus4-C)
(F) I'll sing (Bb)for you, (C) I’ll sing (F)for mother 
(F) We pray-(Bb)ing for the world (Csus4-C)
(F) And for (Bb)the people (A)every-(Dm)where 
Gonna (Gm)show them all we (Csus4)care (C)

[chorus]
Oh my (F)sleeping (Bb)child, the (Dm)world’s so (C)wide
But you have (F)build your (Bb)own (Gm) para-(C)dise
That’s one (F)reason (Bb)why I’ll (Gm)cover you (C)sleeping child
(F-Bb) (Gm-C)

(F) If all (Bb)the people, (C) around (F)the world
(F) They had (Bb)a mind like yours (Csus4-C)
(F) We're have (Bb)no fighting (A)and no (Dm)wars
There would be (Gm)lasting peace on (Csus4)earth (C)

(F) If all (Bb)the kings, (C) and all (F)the leaders
(F) Could see (Bb)you here this way (Csus4-C)
They would (F)hold the (Bb)earth (A)in their (Dm)arms
They would (Gm)learn to watch you (Csus4)play (C) (They would learn to watch)

[chorus]
Oh my (F)sleeping (Bb)child, the (Gm)world’s so (C)wide
But you have (F)build your (Bb)own (Gm) para-(C)dise
That’s one (F)reason (Bb)why I’ll (Gm)cover you (C)sleeping (A)chi-(Dm)ild

[bridge]
(Bb) I'm gonna (F)cover my (Csus4)sleeping (C)child 
(Bb) (F) (Csus4-C)  (Keep you away)
(Bb) Keep you a-(F)way from the world (Csus4) so (C)wild 
(Keep you a-(Bb)way from the (F)world, a-(Csus4)way from the (C)world so wide)
(F-Bb) (Gm-C)

[chorus]
Oh my (F)sleeping (Bb)child, the (Gm)world’s so (C)wide
But you have (F)build your (Bb)own (Gm) para-(C)dise
That’s one (F)reason (Bb)why I’ll (Gm)cover you (C)sleeping child
(F-Bb) (Gm-C)

[chorus again!]
Oh my (F)sleeping (Bb)child, the (Gm)world’s so (C)wide
But you have (F)build your (Bb)own (Gm) para-(C)dise
That’s one (F)reason (Bb)why I’ll (Gm)cover you (C)sleeping child
(F-Bb) (Gm-C)
(F) [end]
